description:
Somos una agencia de tours en la ciudad de Toronto especializada en tours de un d√≠a para conocer las Cataratas del Ni√°gara, el hist√≥rico y pintoresco pueblo de Niagara-On-The-Lake y su regi√≥n vinicola.

Nos esmeramos en brindar una atenci√≥n de calidad a nuestros clientes y a que visiten los lugares m√°s atractivos de la region de Niagara haciendolos sentir como nuestros mejores amigos.

reviews.title: Excellent Tour
text: We loved and enjoyed our trip to Niagara Falls!
I highly recommend this tour.
They offered a great service,  sent us all the information and answered all our questions.

reviews.title: Awesome
text: This was a unique experience. Best tour ever! I‚Äôm planning to come back soon. Thank you very much for your kindness in this spectacular trip! Blessings!

reviews.title: Not just a tour, but a whole experience
text: Formas de llegar a la regi√≥n del Ni√°gara desde Toronto hay muchas; uno puede tomar el autob√∫s, el tren o alquilar un autom√≥vil y conducir. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de disfrutar y crear recuerdos que durar√°n para siempre, De Vago x Toronto es el camino a seguir. Los turistas que visitan Toronto maximizar√°n el uso de su tiempo y tendr√°n una experiencia maravillosa para llevar con ellos de regreso a casa. Para nosotros, los residentes del GTA, que recibimos a familiares que nos visitan, #DVxT nos permite disfrutar del recorrido y reconectarnos con nuestras familias sin preocupaciones. Solo tenemos que soltarnos y disfrutar del paseo. Zaida y Pepe son excelentes gu√≠as de turismo, pero sobre todo, personas extraordinarias que saben c√≥mo hacer su trabajo de tal manera que te sientas c√≥modo y feliz de principio a fin.
English:

Ways to get to the Niagara Region from Toronto are many; one can take the bus, the train or rent a car and drive. However, when it becomes about enjoying and creating memories that last forever, De Vago x Toronto is the way to go. Tourists visiting Toronto will maximize the use of their time and have a wonderful experience to bring with them back home. For us, residents of the GTA, who host our relatives visiting, #DVxT let us enjoy the tour and reconnect with our families worry-free. We just have to let go and enjoy the ride. Zaida and Pepe are great touring guides, but above all, extraordinary persons that know how to do their job in such a way, that you feel comfortable and happy from beginning to end.

reviews.title: Recommended for every type of traveler!
text: Pepe and Zaida are great and professional. Very punctual and helpful. They also have other type of tours and from/to the airport.

reviews.title: Perfect!
text: Just love the way they handle the tours. Either Niagara or Ice Hotel (in season) the experience is just amazing. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: El mejor tour en espa√±ol
text: Jose Miguel y Zaida se aseguran que tu tour de un dia a las cataratas del Niagara sea espectacular. Pasando por Niagara on the Lake, la capilla mas chiquita del mundo y la cata de ice wine hasta llegar a las magnificas cataratas. Simplemente espectacular. No dejen pasar la oportunidad.

Zaida and Jose Miguel make sure you have an amazing time at Niagara, going from Niagara on the lake, ice wine tasting, the smallest chapel arriving to Niagara Falls, it's an amazing trip and in Spanish or English! :) You can't miss it!

reviews.title: Experience was better than I expected
text: Excellent service. Very punctual. Personalized services. Loved it. No doubt I would live to hire your services

reviews.title: Adventure, culture and relaxation üëåüèæüòé
text: Awesome experience. The tour exceeded my expectations in every way. I went to the Falls but ended up fascinated with the Wine Tasting. üòãü§§üëåüèæ

Our Zaida Driver and Guide was outstanding. His knowledge and passion for the history and culture of the place were contagious, I could know aspects of the destination that I had not discovered on my own.

As for the organization and logistics of the tour everything happened as is, there were even extras ü§´üòèüíÖüèª. Plus I didn't have to worry about anything. Transportation and transfers were punctual and comfortable. Pre-tour communication was clear and effective. The itinerary was well planned and adjusted to my needs.
It proved an excellent combination of adventure, culture and relaxation. I felt visiting my friend for years and she took thousands of pictures of me. üôà Zaida made the tour fun and exciting.ü´Ç
The group was small and diverse, making the experience even more enriching.
The value for money is unbeatable. ü§ë
I have just returned but I am already planning to enjoy another of your Tours.ü§≠
I'll tell you how...üòé

reviews.title: Amazing.
text: You cannot miss this tour, in Spanish. Zaida was super nice to us.
They teach you the best of Niagara Falls. Top-rated landscapes...

reviews.title: the best Spanish tour in Toronto!!!!
text: We went with my mother and an aunt, and Zaida played us as Guide, and the truth is I have no words to thank her for the beautifulness of the excursion and the best thing was that it was like going with a friend we had found there!!!! we requested a change in the tour and she did it without any problem and then always attentive with my relatives q are old and we stopped in wonderful places to take photos , and in the end some extras to see !!!! a tour highly and completely recommended and within the prices I had found out, thank you and more thanks ZAIDA !!! in Toronto few tours in Spanish , for lack of time I did not do more with them but certainly q if I return I choose it again!!!!

reviews.title: Excelente Tour
text: Super tour with Pepe. We went to Niagara Falls, then took us to a nice viewpoint, then to a place of Fruit Shopping and Regional Goods and finally to the village Niagara on the Lake.
Everything was super!!. Pepe was explaining and telling us things and customs of life in Canada.
I highly recommend it, it was worth every dollar paid.

reviews.title: Ottawa
text: Very pleasant trip, very friendly, I had an incredible time, the explanations were very good, the recordings were excellent. Super recommended

reviews.title: blue mountain
text: Everything very good. Very friendly from the moment I contacted them and they were willing to pick me up at the airport.
Pepe, very good and kind, taught us and explained everything.
He even gave us skiing lessons.

reviews.title: Unforgettable!
text: Uffff!!! If I could, I would give 1000 stars out of 5 to Pepe :)
The trip was great, we were super comfortable and happy, and we learned a lot of interesting facts that Pepe explained as we passed through places.
Pepe was super accessible to pick us up at the Airbnb where we were staying. He livened up the trip with very pleasant music and helped us feel confident.

We arrived first at Niagara Falls, where Pepe offered to take photos of us with our cell phone so we could all be in the photo. I must say that he has a VERY good photographer's eye and I really appreciated that he cleaned the lens before taking the photos so that they would not be blurred by smudges. Those are the details that one is grateful with the soul because they preserve the beautiful moments that we live.
In Niagara Falls we had enough time to go down on the catamaran ride and walk around the city's attractions.

Afterwards we passed through the scenic road and went to a very nice viewpoint where we took photos. Then we arrived at the little chapel and a little market that my parents loved. Finally we arrived at the wine tasting, where they explained to us how to combine the different wines we tasted with the cheeses and cold meats. It was super delicious, and we ended up buying a few bottles to take home because it was too delicious not to.
Already happy, with a happy tummy and after a tremendous walk, Pepe returned us to where we were staying. Many of us fell asleep because Pepe inspired confidence with his driving.
Super, super, super recommended!
Thank you very much, Pepe! We were super happy!

reviews.title: Incredible, I would definitely return.
text: Hello, my experience on this tour was unforgettable, the places we visited are very beautiful and Pepe is not only a guide, he makes you feel as if you were at home, he is friendly and enjoyable, it is very worth it, I highly recommend him üçÅü•∞ üòé

reviews.title: Two days in Toronto
text: We did the city tour and the incredible excursion to Niagara Falls. The treatment was excellent and in Spanish. Thank you Pepe for making us so happy these days.
